job.description: ltpgtltstronggtTitle Devops EngineerltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocation USA RemoteltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtDuration Contract ltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtNote Client is only looking for US CitizensltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired SkillsExperienceltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe minimum requirements for this role are as followsltpgtltulgtltligt2 years of experience as DevOps engineer SRE software engineer or system engineerltligtltligtProven programming skills Python Linux Shell Java Go etcltligtltligtHandson experience in Kubernetes Docker AWS Ansible Terraform and Linux OS is requiredltligtltligtHandson experience with the following technologies is a definite plusltligtltligtAWS GovCloud and services such as S3 ECS EC2 CloudFront Lambda Route 53 ElastiCache and RDSltligtltligtJenkins Groovy Harness Artifactory Maven or similar CICD pipelines related tools and technologiesltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltemgtIf you are interested please share a good time and your number for a short discussion Alternatively you could share your updated resumeampnbspat ltemgtltstronggtanoshkumarbayonesolutionscomltstronggtltemgtampnbspor call me atampnbspltemgtltstronggt925 2182347ltstronggtltemgt Looking forward to hearing from youltemgtltpgt
